org.microbean.jersey.netty

Class EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.microbean.jersey.netty.EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ByteBufQueue

    public class EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream
extends InputStream
implements ByteBufQueue
    A ByteBufQueue and an InputStream that reads from a (possibly mutating and expanding) CompositeByteBuf, ensuring that all operations occur only on the Netty event loop thread.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    read(byte[], int, int), read(Function)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream(ByteBufAllocator byteBufAllocator, EventExecutor eventExecutor)
      Creates a new EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addByteBuf(ByteBuf byteBuf)
      Adds the supplied ByteBuf to the CompositeByteBuf maintained by this EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream.
      void close()
      Closes this EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream.
      int read() 
      int read(byte[] targetBytes) 
      int read(byte[] targetBytes, int offset, int length) 
      protected int read(Function<? super ByteBuf,? extends Integer> function)
      Applies the supplied Function to a ByteBuf, ensuring that the Function application takes place on the Netty event loop thread, and returns the result of invoking Integer.intValue() on the Function's return value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.io.InputStream

        available, mark, markSupported, reset, skip

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream

        public EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream(ByteBufAllocator byteBufAllocator,
                                         EventExecutor eventExecutor)
        Creates a new EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream.
        Parameters:
        byteBufAllocator - a ByteBufAllocator that will be used to allocate an internal CompositeByteBuf of some variety; must not be null
        eventExecutor - an EventExecutor that will ensure operations occur on the Netty event loop; must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either byteBufAllocator or eventExecutor is null

      • addByteBuf

        public final void addByteBuf(ByteBuf byteBuf)
        Adds the supplied ByteBuf to the CompositeByteBuf maintained by this EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream.
        Specified by:
        addByteBuf in interface ByteBufQueue
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if byteBuf is null

      • read

        protected final int read(Function<? super ByteBuf,? extends Integer> function)
                  throws IOException
        Applies the supplied Function to a ByteBuf, ensuring that the Function application takes place on the Netty event loop thread, and returns the result of invoking Integer.intValue() on the Function's return value.
        Parameters:
        function - the Function to apply; must not be null; must not return null
        Returns:
        an int resulting from the Function application
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is null
        IOException - if the return value of the supplied Function could not be acquired for some reason, or if this EventLoopPinnedByteBufInputStream has been closed
